data.eml:eml: A review of the glyptosternine catfish genus Exostoma Blyth 1860 from Thailand, with descriptions of two new species (Teleostei: Siluriformes)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Heok Hee, Vidthayanon, Chavalit (2014): A review of the glyptosternine catfish genus Exostoma Blyth 1860 from Thailand, with descriptions of two new species (Teleostei: Siluriformes). Zootaxa 3869 (4): 420-434, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3869.4.6
